short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will change the new tab page to show a random cat image and cat fact

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces the new tab page with a cute cat image, a fun cat fact, and your most visited tabs. Not only that, but if you click on the icon, a pop up menu appears with buttons to cat themed productivity tools (plus a few fun ones)!
